name: Puducherry Botanical Garden
address: Puducherry Botanical Garden, Marimalai Adigal Salai, Near New Bus Stand, Puducherry, 605001

description.whenFormed: Established in 1826 during the French colonial period.
description.whoNamed: Named as Puducherry Botanical Garden by the French administration.
description.whyCreated: Created for scientific study, conservation, and public education.
description.maintenance: Maintained by the Department of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare, Government of Puducherry.
description.typeOfPlace: Botanical Garden - spread across a large green area with thousands of plant species.
description.visitorPurpose: Family outings, educational visits, nature walks, relaxation inside the city.
description.specialFeatures: One of the oldest botanical gardens in South India. Houses French-era garden layout with wide variety of plant species and calm green environment inside city.

entryFee: Adults: Rs. 10, Children: Rs. 5, Camera charges: Extra (if applicable)
crowdLevel: Low to Medium (Weekdays), Medium to High (Weekends & Holidays), High (School vacation)

whatHappensDuringFamousTimes.peakSeason: October - February: Best weather, lush greenery
whatHappensDuringFamousTimes.monsoonWaterflow: Monsoon: Plants & ponds look fuller and greener
whatHappensDuringFamousTimes.specialEvents: School holidays: Heavy family & student visits

safetyRules: Follow garden rules to protect plants
environmentalProtection: Do not pluck flowers or plants
